name: Sling Shot - Balls Attack
description:
Destroy all the cubes!!
1/ Tap to aim
2/ Maintain your finger to charge it with balls. Caution, cube are coming down when doing this.
3/ Relase your finger to throw the balls.

Destroy cubes before they enter the danger zone!

Be strategic though, some big numbered block in the back might be tougher to destroy!
